name: Bubble Brew (LD49)
description:
Bubble Brew is a game where you play as an alchemist trying to brew the best recipe and make maximum profit of it. To do that, mix at least three ingredients, keeping an eye on the three gauges: you must have maximum power, minimum toxicity and beware of the instability gauge connected to the cauldron, it might explode very fast! Also there are good and bad synergies, so pay attention to the ingredients sequencing.

Control:

Left click to buy an ingredient

Drag it to the cauldron and drop it

Click “Done” when you’re ready to sell your mixture

Made for Ludum Dare 49 Jam
